name: Hidden Truth
description:
Download the game and play in fullscreen for the best experience

You wake up in the middle of nowhere with a huge regret. Now you have to push forward. 

Go on a journey through in a hidden world while solving puzzles. Trick monsters into dying, stopping and pressing buttons by placing fake blocks and players. Collect notes and find out your tragic past. Can you get over your biggest regret, or will you die trying? 

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 - It is not real

Press Esc to pause the game

Your progress will save, even if you quit. Press reset progress in the main menu to clear your save.
